event.title: include Annan Academy, of which the writer Thomas Carlyle was a pupil, and a Georgian building now

data.event: Its public buildings include Annan Academy, of which the writer Thomas Carlyle was a pupil, and a Georgian building now known as "Bridge House".

event.title: was built in Victorian style in 1878

data.event: The Town Hall was built in Victorian style in 1878, using the local sandstone.
Each year on the first Saturday in July, Annan celebrates the Royal Charter and the boundaries of the Royal Burgh are confirmed when a mounted cavalcade undertakes the Riding of the Marches.
